content.rendered:
Today, we’re sitting down with Michael Blumberg (President & CEO of Blumberg Advisory Group) to discuss why digital transformation is one of the hottest topics within the field service space. In our conversation, we break down:

  • The typical barriers a company faces when trying to digitize their business.
  • How enterprises can push the adoption of digital transformation within their large organization.
  • The areas of field service that will change the most because of digital transformation.
  • How digital transformation directly impacts the customer experience.
  • Will augmented reality play a big role and how should companies prioritize it.

 

Please share your feedback

Send ideas for future episodes to Todd Stewart at Todd@dispatch.me

We appreciate it if you would share the podcast with your coworkers  |  Subscribe to our podcast on iTunes, Soundcloud, and Google Play |  Follow us at Dispatch and Todd Stewart
